channel.title: [PI]-I don't know if this can be done?
channel.description: Okay guys listen carefully or this will make no since to you whatsoever... ____ I want to make a non-degradable item, wear away within a certain about of time (about 10 minutes).. But then! Within 15 minutes of you not having that item wielded, your character gets (poisoned) until they wield the item once again. Is this possible? If so, How?

item.title: [PI]-I don't know if this can be done?
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

[quote=“lostmyphat, post:8, topic:459581”]virgin hahahahaaha ;)[/quote]Haha, my names pretty Ironic actually. ;).
Anyways, do you or ANYONE know how to do that?
I know it’s going to involve creating a timer, and adding poison to the player who clicks on it…
But what I don’t understand is how to make this go on forever.
The item “Cigarettes” i’m basically trying to make them addictive… And if you don’t have one every 15 minutes, you will start to die. And continue to die until you get a cig, or use the cure I will create after this.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]-I don't know if this can be done?
